main event: An orange-red, ball-shaped UFO was observed in Tatum, New Mexico on 17 September 1951.
interesting points: The UFO's speed was slow and it appeared larger than a B-29 aircraft., The object changed direction and reappeared three times during the sighting., Each appearance lasted for about 10 to 15 seconds., The sighting was recorded using ground radar and air visual methods., The case remains unexplained according to the investigating officer.
